channel.title: Home Sweet Home...an anthology
channel.description:
*"Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in."* Robert Frost
An anthology of games concerning themselves with various aspects of making a house a home. You do not have to sign up for every one of these; they are stand-alone games.
Including: House & Home, This World is not Yours, Home, & Surreal Estate.
![Houses4|399x500](upload://ijtGwO7uIiXigMoxvHqvRMTeMRv.jpeg)
House & Home [Sign up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MurLGI5xy60HM-YAP59) [date=2022-04-04 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-04-04 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
This World is Not Yours [Sign up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MurMRm-YWgOnik-ES0x) [date=2022-04-11 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-04-11 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
House [Sign up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MurMpTpvxkeMUMBpzzo) [date=2022-04-18 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-04-18 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
Surreal Estate [Sign up](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MurNEPywK1XQ0oP1NGY) [date=2022-04-25 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-04-25 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
RSVPs open to all from 3rd February at 10pm (GMT)

item.title: Home Sweet Home...an anthology

item.description:
@Donogh wrote:

“Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.”
Robert Frost

An anthology of games concerning themselves with various aspects of making a house a home.
You do not have to sign up for every one of these; they are stand-alone games.

Including: House & Home, This World is not Yours, Home, & Surreal Estate.
